name: Misogi (Andres Perez)
description:
This game was made as a University project by Clara Algara (general design), Andrés Pérez (programming and dubbing (Boss)), Marta Ruiz (art) and Marina Torres (music). It was developed in a game jam style format around the theme "Rituals" (Global Game Jam 2016).

Misogi is the ancient japanese ritual of purification.  A samurai apprentice faces this, his last trial. He must purify the world form demons that have made it their world.
